content:
Sure! Here is an example of an email sequence that you could send to new digital marketing clients:

Email 1 (Welcome):

Subject: Welcome to [Agency Name]!

Dear [Client],

Thank you for choosing [Agency Name] to help your business achieve its digital marketing goals. We are excited to work with you and help your business grow.

To ensure a smooth and successful project, we have outlined a few important details below. Please review this information and let us know if you have any questions.

* Scope of work: Attached to this email is a document outlining the specific services we will be providing for your business. Please review this document carefully and let us know if you have any questions or concerns.
* Timing: Our team will begin work on your project as soon as we have all necessary materials and information. A project timeline will be provided in a separate email.
* Contact information: If you have any questions or concerns at any time during the project, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Our main point of contact will be [Name], but you can also feel free to reach out to any member of our team if needed.

Thank you again for choosing [Agency Name] for your digital marketing needs. We look forward to working with you and helping your business succeed.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Email 2 (Timeline and next steps):

Subject: [Agency Name] Project Timeline and Next Steps

Dear [Client],

Attached to this email is a project timeline outlining the key milestones and deliverables for your digital marketing project. Please review this timeline carefully and let us know if you have any questions or concerns.

In order to move forward with the project, we will need the following items from you by [Date]:

* [List of items needed]

Once we have received these items, our team will begin work on your project. In the meantime, if you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Thank you again for choosing [Agency Name] for your digital marketing needs. We look forward to working with you and helping your business succeed.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Email 3 (Mid-project update):

Subject: [Agency Name] Project Update

Dear [Client],

I wanted to provide a quick update on the progress of your digital marketing project. Our team has been working on [List of completed tasks] and we are on track to meet the milestones outlined in the project timeline.

We have also encountered [List of any issues or challenges]. We are working to resolve these issues as quickly as possible and will keep you updated on our progress.

If you have any questions or concerns at this time, please don't hesitate to reach out. We are here to ensure that your project is a success.

Thank you again for choosing [Agency Name] for your digital marketing needs. We look forward to continuing to work with you and help your business succeed.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Email 4 (Project completion):

Subject: [Agency Name] Project Completion

Dear [Client],

I am pleased to announce that your digital marketing project is now complete. Attached to this email are the final deliverables for your review.

Please take some time to review the materials and let us know if you have any questions or concerns. If there are any revisions that need to be made, please let us know and we will work with you to make sure everything is to your satisfaction.

Once
